net.amoebaman.utils.chat
Class JsonMessage

java.lang.Object
  net.amoebaman.utils.chat.Message
      net.amoebaman.utils.chat.JsonMessage

public class JsonMessage
extends Message

Expanded Message adopted from mkremins's "fanciful", this class provides the ability to generate messages that take full advantage of Minecraft's JSON message formatting for tooltips, on-click actions, formatting, and whatnot, all with convenient chaining capability.

Author:
AmoebaMan

then

public JsonMessage then(java.lang.Object text)
Description copied from class: Message
Adds the next bit of text to this message. If a ColorScheme is in effect, it will automatically be formatted to the normal format of the ColorScheme.

Overrides:
then in class Message

text - some text

public JsonMessage color(org.bukkit.ChatColor color)
Description copied from class: Message

style

public JsonMessage style(org.bukkit.ChatColor... styles)
Description copied from class: Message
Sets the styles for the latest bit of text. If any of the formatting sytles submitted are actually colors, this method will fail silently.

Overrides:
style in class Message
Parameters:
styles - some styles
Returns:
the message (for chaining)

statisticTooltip

public JsonMessage statisticTooltip(org.bukkit.Statistic stat)
Sets the statistic that will be displayed as a tooltip when this bit of text is hovered over in-game. If the statistic requires additional data, this will fail silently.

Parameters:
stat - a statistic
Returns:
the message (for chaining)

statisticTooltip

public JsonMessage statisticTooltip(org.bukkit.Statistic stat,
                                    org.bukkit.Material mat)
Sets the statistic that will be displayed as a tooltip when this bit of text is hovered over in-game. If the extra data provided doesn't match what the statistic needs, this will fail silently.

Parameters:
stat - a statistic
mat - a specific material for the statistic if needed
Returns:
the message (for chaining)

                                    org.bukkit.entity.EntityType entity)
Sets the statistic that will be displayed as a tooltip when this bit of text is hovered over in-game. If the extra data provided doesn't match what the statistic needs, this will fail silently.

Parameters:
stat - a statistic
entity - a specific entity type for the statistic if needed
Returns:
the message (for chaining)
